TheTrainer

Workout Website & App

The Trainer is my first major project that was started toward the beginning my of Bootstrap course. This website and application is intended for personal trainers and their clients to connect.

Trainers have the capability to create custom exercises and workouts to share with their clients. These exercises will have videos and images that will show the client how they are done with proper form. The client will also be able to read a short description of the exercises and log their set, reps, and weights used. Once a workout is completed, the trainer will be notified so they can congratulate and continue to encourage their clients. A chat component will also be built in the near future for continued communication regarding upcoming training sessions, the custom workouts, and more!

My biggest hurdle was converting this idea from basic HTML, CSS, and Boostrap to a React application. Along the way, I made edits to the layout and functionality so the user experience is positive. I plan to also convert this to React Native and offer this website and application to gyms and trainers.
